ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Transport of the HONOURABLE DONALD STEWART MCINNES, P.C., Q.C., of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
